title: CRIS Recruitment 2025 - Apply for Project Assistant Posts
description: Centre for Railway Information Systems (CRIS) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Project Assistant Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 08th, 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the CRIS Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can apply on or before the last date of application. If you are looking for...
